name: Homestead Worsted- Mulberry Wine
description:
Please note- This yarn is hand-dyed in batches and variations from skein to skein are normal. If using more than one skein in a project, alternating skeins will help to prevent pooling.

HOMESTEAD WORSTED

Comforting, warm, and incredibly soft, garments made with this yarn feel like coming home to a cozy fireplace. Perfect yarn for hats and scarves as well!

100% Superwash Merino
Approx. 225 yds/115g
Single Ply Worsted Weight/4-5 sts/inch on #7-9 needles
Hand Wash, Dry Flat
